channel.title: How to change The training speed
channel.description: Sorry about this guys, But does anyone have A tutorial link, On how to change the training speed, Please post one that in understandable - Thanks, Ps: I would like it 45 Minutes to level 100

item.title: How to change The training speed
item.dc:creator: @dyde08 dyde08
item.description:
@dyde08 wrote:

uhhh…that would take a bit of calculation but i do know how to change the exp givin…

ok. for objects there has to be a case,which would be its id with case in front of it…example: a chest giving attack exp(note: this is in client.java)

case 75: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You gain some attack exp"); actionTimer = 10; setAnimation(422); addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[0]), 0); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }

ok,you see the 750? change that to what ever you want the experience per time to be. and also
you see the playerlevel[0] that is attack.(i believe 1 is defence,2 is strength,and so on.)

now,to change the npc kind of experience.
ok we’ll use attack again Ctrl+F if (FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); }
(client.java again)

change 200 to w\e u want it to be

Read full topic
